meanings: (great) master maestro, (권위자) authority (on), (전문가) expert, (특히 음악가) virtuoso,

vlive.korean: [소, 대가가 있음] 소고기는 대가가 없는 게 없고? [There must be a price for beef] But not beef? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU’EST] 아!!! 배코 귀여워서 @?)&* 깬다!!! (🐯: 그걸 깨면.. 안 될 텐뎅..)
vlive.english: [There must be a price for beef] But not beef?

vlive.korean: 소고기는 대가가 없는 게 없고? But there's no such thing as free beef? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 러브야🐯
vlive.english: But there's no such thing as free beef?
